EmailTemplate.subject: Build Great Software with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining us at Gartner Symposium!
Pivotal is committed to transforming the way the world builds software by providing the right combination of platform and process to support our customers' business imperatives. To say that every company must be a software company is simplifying the challenge organizations face, where speed and agility are king, yet security and reliability are mandatory.
We are passionate about partnering with customers to overcome challenges associated with lengthy enterprise IT cycles. With a proven portfolio of methodologies, a powerful platform, and open-source data and analytics software, Pivotal works with customers to implement new approaches and modern tools to build great software. Make IT a business enabler rather than a cost center! How can you make this happen in your org? Two IT leaders spoke about this in Orlando. Hear their stories in these on-demand videos:
- Breakout Session: The Tortoise and the Hare <[[https://gartner.mediasite.com/Mediasite/Play/5f44676347534ea7a0dd63fd88bc19aa1d]]>, as re-told by Andy Zitney, SVP of Enterprise Platforms, Architecture & Innovation at McKesson. - Keynote: CIO Story: Transforming IT With A Purpose <[[https://www.gartnereventsondemand.com/session-video/SYM27/CS3]]>, with Steve Betts, Senior Vice President and CIO Blue Cross Blue Shield of Illinois, Montana, New Mexico, Oklahoma, and Texas.
Until we meet again, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/gartner-symposium-orlando?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-symposium-all-fl-q417 Show less]]> are some resources to start you on your journey. And, for more white papers, webinars, eBooks, and case studies, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-symposium-all-fl-q417]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-symposium-all-fl-q417]]>.
